name: raining in davis
description:
This is a short not-really-interactive media piece that I made while learning Pico8 in April of 2018, featuring snails and a cover of Lucy Dacus' "I Don't Wanna Be Funny Anymore" made using Pico8's music editor. It takes just a couple minutes to run fully through.

Press M to start.

Game not starting? Maybe sure you click the game before you press M.

After the "snail heart" scene, the game is done, and the clouds will just keep going forever.
